title: How does 2020 stack up among the most notable years in American history? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: How does 2020 stack up among the most notable years in American history? If we start with year 1776, then there are 244 years to choose from. 2020 probably ranks around 50th in terms of “most notable years” of the US Republic. AT A MINIMUM the years below are more notable than 2020 thru date 6/4/2020. 1776 1777 1778 1779 1780 1781 1782 1783 1803 1812 1845 1846 1861 1862 1863 1864 1865 1901 1917 1918 1929 1930 1931 1932 1941 1942 1943 1944 1945 1950 1951 1952 1963 1964 1974 1980 1992 1994 2001 2002 2004 2008
Where the shit line goes, it’s probably just below the Cholera Plague, The Civil War and the Great Depression.
